text: Hamidreza Elahi (born 15 August 1994 in Tonekabon, Iran) is an Iranian football coach and analyst. He works as an analyst for Persepolis F.C. in the Persian Gulf Pro League. == Career == Elahi started his career in football coaching at the youth level. He has been the head coach of the youth team at Kia Academy and worked as an assistant coach in the Iranian League 3. He later became a football analyst for several teams in the Persian Gulf Pro League, including Nassaji Mazandaran F.C., Gol Gohar Sirjan F.C., and Kia Academy. In 2025, Hamidreza Elahi joined the coaching staff of Persepolis F.C. as a football analyst. == Achievements == * Runner-up in the Iran National Youth League * Three-time Champion of the Mazandaran Provincial League * Runner-up in the Tehran Youth Premier League * Promotion to Iran's League 3 with Kia Academy == Coaching Certifications == * AFC D Coaching License * AFC C Coaching License * AFC B Coaching License == References ==
title: Hamidreza Elahi
